author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a contest of strong arms, almost 400 fast bowlers vied for the fastest delivery at the ‘MoneyGram Golden Arm Bowling Challenge’ held at theArmed Police Grounds here on Thursday.

Suresh who bowled a 73 mph delivery bagged the first prize of Rs.10,000 in the two-day event.

Tickets to 2020 match

India's top four fastest bowlers will receive tickets to watch the 2016 ICC World Twenty20 match.

The MoneyGram Golden Arm Bowling Challenge in Tamil Nadu has concluded its Chennai and Coimbatore editions recently.

Next tour in Telangana

The tour will then head to Telangana as part its nation-wide tour.

The bowling challenge has already commenced in Gujarat, Kerala, Punjab, Bihar and Uttar Pradesh.
title: 400 vie for Golden Arm Bowling Challenge
